channel.title: Potions dont work 317 Cecapk
channel.description: Hello guys, whenever i go to drink any potion it doesnt go down a dose nor does it boost stats, HELP!

item.title: Potions dont work 317 Cecapk
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:8, topic:523916”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=642460.msg4326468#msg4326468 date=1373002960]

Add an item action

why do you reply like this to almost every help thread?

If someone asked you to help because there house was on fire, would you reply ‘put out the fire’? No.

That’s basically all you’re doing when you reply to a help thread, stating something completely obvious. Yes, you shouldn’t spoonfeed, but what you do doesn’t help anyone at all.

OT: you need to provide the base you’re using if you want me to help you

He asked ‘how’ he didn’t give any specifics.
Notice, you can’t help him either. Weird.

I can’t help him without knowing the base.
[/quote]
Just tell him to edit the packet handler. :P[/quote]
Truthfully, given the detail that he has. Your full solution would start like this.
Step 1: read the rules
Step 2: put useful information (the more the better!, worse come to worst its not looked at)
Step 3: learn java
Step 4: learn more java
Step 5: repeat step 4 for 3 years.
Step 6: help others on the help section while waiting for an answer
Step 7: After 2 days of waiting for response to Step 6, fix your own problem.
At least thats how it went for me lol.
But for me 3 years was more like 9 .-.
I guess i realy have been doing this since moparscape was born

on topic.
crap i forgot the question.

Read full topic
